status.loaded: The plugin has been successfully loaded.
status.enabled: The plugin has been successfully enabled.

promo.description: Allows users to activate promo code

promo-admin.description: Allows users to manage promo codes

promo-languages.description: Allows users to know supported languages

message.success: You have successfully activated the promo code. You have received a bonus in the parameter: %amount%

error.activated: You have already used this promo code.
error.cancelled: An error occurred while activating the promo code.

form.title: Activate promo code
form.label: To activate the promo code, fill out the form below.

message.successful: You have successfully created a promo code.

error.amount: The bonus amount must be an integer greater than 0.
error.action_time: The action time must be an integer greater than 0.
error.uses_limited: The maximum count of uses must be an integer greater than 0.
error.cancelled: An error occurred while creating the promo code.

form.title: Create promo code
form.label: Fill out the form below to create a promo code.

amount.empty: The bonus amount cannot be empty.

toggle.text: Will the promo code be temporary?

form.title: Time setting
form.label: To create a temporary promo code, fill out the form below.

input.empty: The action time cannot be empty.

form.title: Setting the maximum number of uses
form.label: To create an uses limited promo code, fill out the form below.

input.empty: The maximum count of uses cannot be empty.

message.successful: You have successfully delete the promo code.

error.cancelled: An error occurred while deleting the promo code.

form.title: Delete promo code
form.label: To delete a promo code, fill out the form below.

message.successful:
Information about the promo code (%promo%):Bonus amount: %amount%
Date of creation: %creation_time%
Count of uses: %uses%
Count of max uses: %max_uses%
Action time: %action_time% sec.

Promo code type: %promo_type%

form.title: Information about the promo code
form.label: To view information about the promo code, fill out the form below.
